Description:________________________________________
A remake of the classic shooter of the same name in 1997 by 3D Realms, created an independent development studio Flying Wild Hog.
Shadow Warrior - is the story of Lena Chi, the mercenary corporation "Zilla Enterprises", who was ordered to get a mysterious sword Nobitsura Kage, granting unlimited power. Upon learning that the unusual blade belongs to the ancient gods of another reality, and the intention of truly awful, Chi Len becomes reluctant hero. Swords and guns, otherworldly magic and his own wits to help him expose those who are behind the invasion of demons into our world, and send evil back into the darkness.

Features:________________________________________
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢	Shadow Warrior Reborn - A bold new vision of Shadow Warrior elegantly blends classic first-person shooter gameplay with thrilling action, inventive combat, and a contemporary retelling of the hilarious legend of Lo Wang. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢	Elegant Swordplay - Unsheathe your legendary katana to slice enemies apart with precisely targeted swings or unleash fluid combos and special attacks to cut down hordes of enemies with one swift pass through the enraged hordes. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢	Upgradeable Arsenal - Utilize every gun in your formidable armory - from stylish revolvers and quad barrel shotguns to explosive-tipped crossbow bolts and laser-guided rocket launchers. Each weapon offers several unique upgrades to increase power, speed, and add devastating alternative firing options. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢	 Mystical Powers - Call upon mystical powers to protect yourself and paralyze your enemies or use their own severed heads and still-beating hearts to bring them to their knees.
